00009 if(Object.isUndefined(Effect))
00010   throw("dragdrop.js requires including script.aculo.us' effects.js library");
00011 
00012 var Droppables = {
00013   drops: [],
00014 
00015   remove: function(element) {
00016     this.drops = this.drops.reject(function(d) { return d.element==$(element) });
00017   },
00018 
00019   add: function(element) {
00020     element = $(element);
00021     var options = Object.extend({
00022       greedy:     true,
00023       hoverclass: null,
00024       tree:       false
00025     }, arguments[1] || { });
00026 
00027     // cache containers
00028     if(options.containment) {
00029       options._containers = [];
00030       var containment = options.containment;
00031       if(Object.isArray(containment)) {
00032         containment.each( function(c) { options._containers.push($(c)) });
00033       } else {
00034         options._containers.push($(containment));
00035       }
00036     }
00037     
00038     if(options.accept) options.accept = [options.accept].flatten();
00039 
00040     Element.makePositioned(element); // fix IE
00041     options.element = element;
00042 
00043     this.drops.push(options);
00044   },
00045   
00046   findDeepestChild: function(drops) {
00047     deepest = drops[0];
00048       
00049     for (i = 1; i < drops.length; ++i)
00050       if (Element.isParent(drops[i].element, deepest.element))
00051         deepest = drops[i];
00052     
00053     return deepest;
00054   },
00055 
00056   isContained: function(element, drop) {
00057     var containmentNode;
00058     if(drop.tree) {
00059       containmentNode = element.treeNode; 
00060     } else {
00061       containmentNode = element.parentNode;
00062     }
00063     return drop._containers.detect(function(c) { return containmentNode == c });
00064   },
00065   
00066   isAffected: function(point, element, drop) {
00067     return (
00068       (drop.element!=element) &&
00069       ((!drop._containers) ||
00070         this.isContained(element, drop)) &&
00071       ((!drop.accept) ||
00072         (Element.classNames(element).detect( 
00073           function(v) { return drop.accept.include(v) } ) )) &&
00074       Position.within(drop.element, point[0], point[1]) );
00075   },
00076 
00077   deactivate: function(drop) {
00078     if(drop.hoverclass)
00079       Element.removeClassName(drop.element, drop.hoverclass);
00080     this.last_active = null;
00081   },
00082 
00083   activate: function(drop) {
00084     if(drop.hoverclass)
00085       Element.addClassName(drop.element, drop.hoverclass);
00086     this.last_active = drop;
00087   },
00088 
00089   show: function(point, element) {
00090     if(!this.drops.length) return;
00091     var drop, affected = [];
00092     
00093     this.drops.each( function(drop) {
00094       if(Droppables.isAffected(point, element, drop))
00095         affected.push(drop);
00096     });
00097         
00098     if(affected.length>0)
00099       drop = Droppables.findDeepestChild(affected);
00100 
00101     if(this.last_active && this.last_active != drop) this.deactivate(this.last_active);
00102     if (drop) {
00103       Position.within(drop.element, point[0], point[1]);
00104       if(drop.onHover)
00105         drop.onHover(element, drop.element, Position.overlap(drop.overlap, drop.element));
00106       
00107       if (drop != this.last_active) Droppables.activate(drop);
00108     }
00109   },
00110 
00111   fire: function(event, element) {
00112     if(!this.last_active) return;
00113     Position.prepare();
00114 
00115     if (this.isAffected([Event.pointerX(event), Event.pointerY(event)], element, this.last_active))
00116       if (this.last_active.onDrop) {
00117         this.last_active.onDrop(element, this.last_active.element, event); 
00118         return true; 
00119       }
00120   },
00121 
00122   reset: function() {
00123     if(this.last_active)
00124       this.deactivate(this.last_active);
00125   }
00126 }
00127 
00128 var Draggables = {
00129   drags: [],
00130   observers: [],
00131   
00132   register: function(draggable) {
00133     if(this.drags.length == 0) {
00134       this.eventMouseUp   = this.endDrag.bindAsEventListener(this);
00135       this.eventMouseMove = this.updateDrag.bindAsEventListener(this);
00136       this.eventKeypress  = this.keyPress.bindAsEventListener(this);
00137       
00138       Event.observe(document, "mouseup", this.eventMouseUp);
00139       Event.observe(document, "mousemove", this.eventMouseMove);
00140       Event.observe(document, "keypress", this.eventKeypress);
00141     }
00142     this.drags.push(draggable);
00143   },
00144   
00145   unregister: function(draggable) {
00146     this.drags = this.drags.reject(function(d) { return d==draggable });
00147     if(this.drags.length == 0) {
00148       Event.stopObserving(document, "mouseup", this.eventMouseUp);
00149       Event.stopObserving(document, "mousemove", this.eventMouseMove);
00150       Event.stopObserving(document, "keypress", this.eventKeypress);
00151     }
00152   },
00153   
00154   activate: function(draggable) {
00155     if(draggable.options.delay) { 
00156       this._timeout = setTimeout(function() { 
00157         Draggables._timeout = null; 
00158         window.focus(); 
00159         Draggables.activeDraggable = draggable; 
00160       }.bind(this), draggable.options.delay); 
00161     } else {
00162       window.focus(); // allows keypress events if window isn't currently focused, fails for Safari
00163       this.activeDraggable = draggable;
00164     }
00165   },
00166   
00167   deactivate: function() {
00168     this.activeDraggable = null;
00169   },
00170   
00171   updateDrag: function(event) {
00172     if(!this.activeDraggable) return;
00173     var pointer = [Event.pointerX(event), Event.pointerY(event)];
00174     // Mozilla-based browsers fire successive mousemove events with
00175     // the same coordinates, prevent needless redrawing (moz bug?)
00176     if(this._lastPointer && (this._lastPointer.inspect() == pointer.inspect())) return;
00177     this._lastPointer = pointer;
00178     
00179     this.activeDraggable.updateDrag(event, pointer);
00180   },
00181   
00182   endDrag: function(event) {
00183     if(this._timeout) { 
00184       clearTimeout(this._timeout); 
00185       this._timeout = null; 
00186     }
00187     if(!this.activeDraggable) return;
00188     this._lastPointer = null;
00189     this.activeDraggable.endDrag(event);
00190     this.activeDraggable = null;
00191   },
00192   
00193   keyPress: function(event) {
00194     if(this.activeDraggable)
00195       this.activeDraggable.keyPress(event);
00196   },
00197   
00198   addObserver: function(observer) {
00199     this.observers.push(observer);
00200     this._cacheObserverCallbacks();
00201   },
00202   
00203   removeObserver: function(element) {  // element instead of observer fixes mem leaks
00204     this.observers = this.observers.reject( function(o) { return o.element==element });
00205     this._cacheObserverCallbacks();
00206   },
00207   
00208   notify: function(eventName, draggable, event) {  // 'onStart', 'onEnd', 'onDrag'
00209     if(this[eventName+'Count'] > 0)
00210       this.observers.each( function(o) {
00211         if(o[eventName]) o[eventName](eventName, draggable, event);
00212       });
00213     if(draggable.options[eventName]) draggable.options[eventName](draggable, event);
00214   },
00215   
00216   _cacheObserverCallbacks: function() {
00217     ['onStart','onEnd','onDrag'].each( function(eventName) {
00218       Draggables[eventName+'Count'] = Draggables.observers.select(
00219         function(o) { return o[eventName]; }
00220       ).length;
00221     });
00222   }
00223 }
00224 
00225 /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00226 
00227 var Draggable = Class.create({
00228   initialize: function(element) {
00229     var defaults = {
00230       handle: false,
00231       reverteffect: function(element, top_offset, left_offset) {
00232         var dur = Math.sqrt(Math.abs(top_offset^2)+Math.abs(left_offset^2))*0.02;
00233         new Effect.Move(element, { x: -left_offset, y: -top_offset, duration: dur,
00234           queue: {scope:'_draggable', position:'end'}
00235         });
00236       },
00237       endeffect: function(element) {
00238         var toOpacity = Object.isNumber(element._opacity) ? element._opacity : 1.0;
00239         new Effect.Opacity(element, {duration:0.2, from:0.7, to:toOpacity, 
00240           queue: {scope:'_draggable', position:'end'},
00241           afterFinish: function(){ 
00242             Draggable._dragging[element] = false 
00243           }
00244         }); 
00245       },
00246       zindex: 1000,
00247       revert: false,
00248       quiet: false,
00249       scroll: false,
00250       scrollSensitivity: 20,
00251       scrollSpeed: 15,
00252       snap: false,  // false, or xy or [x,y] or function(x,y){ return [x,y] }
00253       delay: 0
00254     };
00255     
00256     if(!arguments[1] || Object.isUndefined(arguments[1].endeffect))
00257       Object.extend(defaults, {
00258         starteffect: function(element) {
00259           element._opacity = Element.getOpacity(element);
00260           Draggable._dragging[element] = true;
00261           new Effect.Opacity(element, {duration:0.2, from:element._opacity, to:0.7}); 
00262         }
00263       });
00264     
00265     var options = Object.extend(defaults, arguments[1] || { });
00266 
00267     this.element = $(element);
00268     
00269     if(options.handle && Object.isString(options.handle))
00270       this.handle = this.element.down('.'+options.handle, 0);
00271     
00272     if(!this.handle) this.handle = $(options.handle);
00273     if(!this.handle) this.handle = this.element;
00274     
00275     if(options.scroll && !options.scroll.scrollTo && !options.scroll.outerHTML) {
00276       options.scroll = $(options.scroll);
00277       this._isScrollChild = Element.childOf(this.element, options.scroll);
00278     }
00279 
00280     Element.makePositioned(this.element); // fix IE    
00281 
00282     this.options  = options;
00283     this.dragging = false;   
00284 
00285     this.eventMouseDown = this.initDrag.bindAsEventListener(this);
00286     Event.observe(this.handle, "mousedown", this.eventMouseDown);
00287     
00288     Draggables.register(this);
00289   },
00290   
00291   destroy: function() {
00292     Event.stopObserving(this.handle, "mousedown", this.eventMouseDown);
00293     Draggables.unregister(this);
00294   },
00295   
00296   currentDelta: function() {
00297     return([
00298       parseInt(Element.getStyle(this.element,'left') || '0'),
00299       parseInt(Element.getStyle(this.element,'top') || '0')]);
00300   },
00301   
00302   initDrag: function(event) {
00303     if(!Object.isUndefined(Draggable._dragging[this.element]) &&
00304       Draggable._dragging[this.element]) return;
00305     if(Event.isLeftClick(event)) {    
00306       // abort on form elements, fixes a Firefox issue
00307       var src = Event.element(event);
00308       if((tag_name = src.tagName.toUpperCase()) && (
00309         tag_name=='INPUT' ||
00310         tag_name=='SELECT' ||
00311         tag_name=='OPTION' ||
00312         tag_name=='BUTTON' ||
00313         tag_name=='TEXTAREA')) return;
00314         
00315       var pointer = [Event.pointerX(event), Event.pointerY(event)];
00316       var pos     = Position.cumulativeOffset(this.element);
00317       this.offset = [0,1].map( function(i) { return (pointer[i] - pos[i]) });
00318       
00319       Draggables.activate(this);
00320       Event.stop(event);
00321     }
00322   },
00323   
00324   startDrag: function(event) {
00325     this.dragging = true;
00326     if(!this.delta)
00327       this.delta = this.currentDelta();
00328     
00329     if(this.options.zindex) {
00330       this.originalZ = parseInt(Element.getStyle(this.element,'z-index') || 0);
00331       this.element.style.zIndex = this.options.zindex;
00332     }
00333     
00334     if(this.options.ghosting) {
00335       this._clone = this.element.cloneNode(true);
00336       this.element._originallyAbsolute = (this.element.getStyle('position') == 'absolute');
00337       if (!this.element._originallyAbsolute)
00338         Position.absolutize(this.element);
00339       this.element.parentNode.insertBefore(this._clone, this.element);
00340     }
00341     
00342     if(this.options.scroll) {
00343       if (this.options.scroll == window) {
00344         var where = this._getWindowScroll(this.options.scroll);
00345         this.originalScrollLeft = where.left;
00346         this.originalScrollTop = where.top;
00347       } else {
00348         this.originalScrollLeft = this.options.scroll.scrollLeft;
00349         this.originalScrollTop = this.options.scroll.scrollTop;
00350       }
00351     }
00352     
00353     Draggables.notify('onStart', this, event);
00354         
00355     if(this.options.starteffect) this.options.starteffect(this.element);
00356   },
00357   
00358   updateDrag: function(event, pointer) {
00359     if(!this.dragging) this.startDrag(event);
00360     
00361     if(!this.options.quiet){
00362       Position.prepare();
00363       Droppables.show(pointer, this.element);
00364     }
00365     
00366     Draggables.notify('onDrag', this, event);
00367     
00368     this.draw(pointer);
00369     if(this.options.change) this.options.change(this);
00370     
00371     if(this.options.scroll) {
00372       this.stopScrolling();
00373       
00374       var p;
00375       if (this.options.scroll == window) {
00376         with(this._getWindowScroll(this.options.scroll)) { p = [ left, top, left+width, top+height ]; }
00377       } else {
00378         p = Position.page(this.options.scroll);
00379         p[0] += this.options.scroll.scrollLeft + Position.deltaX;
00380         p[1] += this.options.scroll.scrollTop + Position.deltaY;
00381         p.push(p[0]+this.options.scroll.offsetWidth);
00382         p.push(p[1]+this.options.scroll.offsetHeight);
00383       }
00384       var speed = [0,0];
00385       if(pointer[0] < (p[0]+this.options.scrollSensitivity)) speed[0] = pointer[0]-(p[0]+this.options.scrollSensitivity);
00386       if(pointer[1] < (p[1]+this.options.scrollSensitivity)) speed[1] = pointer[1]-(p[1]+this.options.scrollSensitivity);
00387       if(pointer[0] > (p[2]-this.options.scrollSensitivity)) speed[0] = pointer[0]-(p[2]-this.options.scrollSensitivity);
00388       if(pointer[1] > (p[3]-this.options.scrollSensitivity)) speed[1] = pointer[1]-(p[3]-this.options.scrollSensitivity);
00389       this.startScrolling(speed);
00390     }
00391     
00392     // fix AppleWebKit rendering
00393     if(Prototype.Browser.WebKit) window.scrollBy(0,0);
00394     
00395     Event.stop(event);
00396   },
00397   
00398   finishDrag: function(event, success) {
00399     this.dragging = false;
00400     
00401     if(this.options.quiet){
00402       Position.prepare();
00403       var pointer = [Event.pointerX(event), Event.pointerY(event)];
00404       Droppables.show(pointer, this.element);
00405     }
00406 
00407     if(this.options.ghosting) {
00408       if (!this.element._originallyAbsolute)
00409         Position.relativize(this.element);
00410       delete this.element._originallyAbsolute;
00411       Element.remove(this._clone);
00412       this._clone = null;
00413     }
00414 
00415     var dropped = false; 
00416     if(success) { 
00417       dropped = Droppables.fire(event, this.element); 
00418       if (!dropped) dropped = false; 
00419     }
00420     if(dropped && this.options.onDropped) this.options.onDropped(this.element);
00421     Draggables.notify('onEnd', this, event);
00422 
00423     var revert = this.options.revert;
00424     if(revert && Object.isFunction(revert)) revert = revert(this.element);
00425     
00426     var d = this.currentDelta();
00427     if(revert && this.options.reverteffect) {
00428       if (dropped == 0 || revert != 'failure')
00429         this.options.reverteffect(this.element,
00430           d[1]-this.delta[1], d[0]-this.delta[0]);
00431     } else {
00432       this.delta = d;
00433     }
00434 
00435     if(this.options.zindex)
00436       this.element.style.zIndex = this.originalZ;
00437 
00438     if(this.options.endeffect) 
00439       this.options.endeffect(this.element);
00440       
00441     Draggables.deactivate(this);
00442     Droppables.reset();
00443   },
00444   
00445   keyPress: function(event) {
00446     if(event.keyCode!=Event.KEY_ESC) return;
00447     this.finishDrag(event, false);
00448     Event.stop(event);
00449   },
00450   
00451   endDrag: function(event) {
00452     if(!this.dragging) return;
00453     this.stopScrolling();
00454     this.finishDrag(event, true);
00455     Event.stop(event);
00456   },
00457   
00458   draw: function(point) {
00459     var pos = Position.cumulativeOffset(this.element);
00460     if(this.options.ghosting) {
00461       var r   = Position.realOffset(this.element);
00462       pos[0] += r[0] - Position.deltaX; pos[1] += r[1] - Position.deltaY;
00463     }
00464     
00465     var d = this.currentDelta();
00466     pos[0] -= d[0]; pos[1] -= d[1];
00467     
00468     if(this.options.scroll && (this.options.scroll != window && this._isScrollChild)) {
00469       pos[0] -= this.options.scroll.scrollLeft-this.originalScrollLeft;
00470       pos[1] -= this.options.scroll.scrollTop-this.originalScrollTop;
00471     }
00472     
00473     var p = [0,1].map(function(i){ 
00474       return (point[i]-pos[i]-this.offset[i]) 
00475     }.bind(this));
00476     
00477     if(this.options.snap) {
00478       if(Object.isFunction(this.options.snap)) {
00479         p = this.options.snap(p[0],p[1],this);
00480       } else {
00481       if(Object.isArray(this.options.snap)) {
00482         p = p.map( function(v, i) {
00483           return (v/this.options.snap[i]).round()*this.options.snap[i] }.bind(this))
00484       } else {
00485         p = p.map( function(v) {
00486           return (v/this.options.snap).round()*this.options.snap }.bind(this))
00487       }
00488     }}
00489     
00490     var style = this.element.style;
00491     if((!this.options.constraint) || (this.options.constraint=='horizontal'))
00492       style.left = p[0] + "px";
00493     if((!this.options.constraint) || (this.options.constraint=='vertical'))
00494       style.top  = p[1] + "px";
00495     
00496     if(style.visibility=="hidden") style.visibility = ""; // fix gecko rendering
00497   },
00498   
00499   stopScrolling: function() {
00500     if(this.scrollInterval) {
00501       clearInterval(this.scrollInterval);
00502       this.scrollInterval = null;
00503       Draggables._lastScrollPointer = null;
00504     }
00505   },
00506   
00507   startScrolling: function(speed) {
00508     if(!(speed[0] || speed[1])) return;
00509     this.scrollSpeed = [speed[0]*this.options.scrollSpeed,speed[1]*this.options.scrollSpeed];
00510     this.lastScrolled = new Date();
00511     this.scrollInterval = setInterval(this.scroll.bind(this), 10);
00512   },
00513   
00514   scroll: function() {
00515     var current = new Date();
00516     var delta = current - this.lastScrolled;
00517     this.lastScrolled = current;
00518     if(this.options.scroll == window) {
00519       with (this._getWindowScroll(this.options.scroll)) {
00520         if (this.scrollSpeed[0] || this.scrollSpeed[1]) {
00521           var d = delta / 1000;
00522           this.options.scroll.scrollTo( left + d*this.scrollSpeed[0], top + d*this.scrollSpeed[1] );
00523         }
00524       }
00525     } else {
00526       this.options.scroll.scrollLeft += this.scrollSpeed[0] * delta / 1000;
00527       this.options.scroll.scrollTop  += this.scrollSpeed[1] * delta / 1000;
00528     }
00529     
00530     Position.prepare();
00531     Droppables.show(Draggables._lastPointer, this.element);
00532     Draggables.notify('onDrag', this);
00533     if (this._isScrollChild) {
00534       Draggables._lastScrollPointer = Draggables._lastScrollPointer || $A(Draggables._lastPointer);
00535       Draggables._lastScrollPointer[0] += this.scrollSpeed[0] * delta / 1000;
00536       Draggables._lastScrollPointer[1] += this.scrollSpeed[1] * delta / 1000;
00537       if (Draggables._lastScrollPointer[0] < 0)
00538         Draggables._lastScrollPointer[0] = 0;
00539       if (Draggables._lastScrollPointer[1] < 0)
00540         Draggables._lastScrollPointer[1] = 0;
00541       this.draw(Draggables._lastScrollPointer);
00542     }
00543     
00544     if(this.options.change) this.options.change(this);
00545   },
00546   
00547   _getWindowScroll: function(w) {
00548     var T, L, W, H;
00549     with (w.document) {
00550       if (w.document.documentElement && documentElement.scrollTop) {
00551         T = documentElement.scrollTop;
00552         L = documentElement.scrollLeft;
00553       } else if (w.document.body) {
00554         T = body.scrollTop;
00555         L = body.scrollLeft;
00556       }
00557       if (w.innerWidth) {
00558         W = w.innerWidth;
00559         H = w.innerHeight;
00560       } else if (w.document.documentElement && documentElement.clientWidth) {
00561         W = documentElement.clientWidth;
00562         H = documentElement.clientHeight;
00563       } else {
00564         W = body.offsetWidth;
00565         H = body.offsetHeight
00566       }
00567     }
00568     return { top: T, left: L, width: W, height: H };
00569   }
00570 });
00571 
00572 Draggable._dragging = { };

00575 
00576 var SortableObserver = Class.create({
00577   initialize: function(element, observer) {
00578     this.element   = $(element);
00579     this.observer  = observer;
00580     this.lastValue = Sortable.serialize(this.element);
00581   },
00582   
00583   onStart: function() {
00584     this.lastValue = Sortable.serialize(this.element);
00585   },
00586   
00587   onEnd: function() {
00588     Sortable.unmark();
00589     if(this.lastValue != Sortable.serialize(this.element))
00590       this.observer(this.element)
00591   }
00592 });
00593 
00594 var Sortable = {
00595   SERIALIZE_RULE: /^[^_\-](?:[A-Za-z0-9\-\_]*)[_](.*)$/,
00596   
00597   sortables: { },
00598   
00599   _findRootElement: function(element) {
00600     while (element.tagName.toUpperCase() != "BODY") {  
00601       if(element.id && Sortable.sortables[element.id]) return element;
00602       element = element.parentNode;
00603     }
00604   },
00605 
00606   options: function(element) {
00607     element = Sortable._findRootElement($(element));
00608     if(!element) return;
00609     return Sortable.sortables[element.id];
00610   },
00611   
00612   destroy: function(element){
00613     var s = Sortable.options(element);
00614     
00615     if(s) {
00616       Draggables.removeObserver(s.element);
00617       s.droppables.each(function(d){ Droppables.remove(d) });
00618       s.draggables.invoke('destroy');
00619       
00620       delete Sortable.sortables[s.element.id];
00621     }
00622   },
00623 
00624   create: function(element) {
00625     element = $(element);
00626     var options = Object.extend({ 
00627       element:     element,
00628       tag:         'li',       // assumes li children, override with tag: 'tagname'
00629       dropOnEmpty: false,
00630       tree:        false,
00631       treeTag:     'ul',
00632       overlap:     'vertical', // one of 'vertical', 'horizontal'
00633       constraint:  'vertical', // one of 'vertical', 'horizontal', false
00634       containment: element,    // also takes array of elements (or id's); or false
00635       handle:      false,      // or a CSS class
00636       only:        false,
00637       delay:       0,
00638       hoverclass:  null,
00639       ghosting:    false,
00640       quiet:       false, 
00641       scroll:      false,
00642       scrollSensitivity: 20,
00643       scrollSpeed: 15,
00644       format:      this.SERIALIZE_RULE,
00645       
00646       // these take arrays of elements or ids and can be 
00647       // used for better initialization performance
00648       elements:    false,
00649       handles:     false,
00650       
00651       onChange:    Prototype.emptyFunction,
00652       onUpdate:    Prototype.emptyFunction
00653     }, arguments[1] || { });
00654 
00655     // clear any old sortable with same element
00656     this.destroy(element);
00657 
00658     // build options for the draggables
00659     var options_for_draggable = {
00660       revert:      true,
00661       quiet:       options.quiet,
00662       scroll:      options.scroll,
00663       scrollSpeed: options.scrollSpeed,
00664       scrollSensitivity: options.scrollSensitivity,
00665       delay:       options.delay,
00666       ghosting:    options.ghosting,
00667       constraint:  options.constraint,
00668       handle:      options.handle };
00669 
00670     if(options.starteffect)
00671       options_for_draggable.starteffect = options.starteffect;
00672 
00673     if(options.reverteffect)
00674       options_for_draggable.reverteffect = options.reverteffect;
00675     else
00676       if(options.ghosting) options_for_draggable.reverteffect = function(element) {
00677         element.style.top  = 0;
00678         element.style.left = 0;
00679       };
00680 
00681     if(options.endeffect)
00682       options_for_draggable.endeffect = options.endeffect;
00683 
00684     if(options.zindex)
00685       options_for_draggable.zindex = options.zindex;
00686 
00687     // build options for the droppables  
00688     var options_for_droppable = {
00689       overlap:     options.overlap,
00690       containment: options.containment,
00691       tree:        options.tree,
00692       hoverclass:  options.hoverclass,
00693       onHover:     Sortable.onHover
00694     }
00695     
00696     var options_for_tree = {
00697       onHover:      Sortable.onEmptyHover,
00698       overlap:      options.overlap,
00699       containment:  options.containment,
00700       hoverclass:   options.hoverclass
00701     }
00702 
00703     // fix for gecko engine
00704     Element.cleanWhitespace(element); 
00705 
00706     options.draggables = [];
00707     options.droppables = [];
00708 
00709     // drop on empty handling
00710     if(options.dropOnEmpty || options.tree) {
00711       Droppables.add(element, options_for_tree);
00712       options.droppables.push(element);
00713     }
00714 
00715     (options.elements || this.findElements(element, options) || []).each( function(e,i) {
00716       var handle = options.handles ? $(options.handles[i]) :
00717         (options.handle ? $(e).select('.' + options.handle)[0] : e); 
00718       options.draggables.push(
00719         new Draggable(e, Object.extend(options_for_draggable, { handle: handle })));
00720       Droppables.add(e, options_for_droppable);
00721       if(options.tree) e.treeNode = element;
00722       options.droppables.push(e);      
00723     });
00724     
00725     if(options.tree) {
00726       (Sortable.findTreeElements(element, options) || []).each( function(e) {
00727         Droppables.add(e, options_for_tree);
00728         e.treeNode = element;
00729         options.droppables.push(e);
00730       });
00731     }
00732 
00733     // keep reference
00734     this.sortables[element.id] = options;
00735 
00736     // for onupdate
00737     Draggables.addObserver(new SortableObserver(element, options.onUpdate));
00738 
00739   },
00740 
00741   // return all suitable-for-sortable elements in a guaranteed order
00742   findElements: function(element, options) {
00743     return Element.findChildren(
00744       element, options.only, options.tree ? true : false, options.tag);
00745   },
00746   
00747   findTreeElements: function(element, options) {
00748     return Element.findChildren(
00749       element, options.only, options.tree ? true : false, options.treeTag);
00750   },
00751 
00752   onHover: function(element, dropon, overlap) {
00753     if(Element.isParent(dropon, element)) return;
00754 
00755     if(overlap > .33 && overlap < .66 && Sortable.options(dropon).tree) {
00756       return;
00757     } else if(overlap>0.5) {
00758       Sortable.mark(dropon, 'before');
00759       if(dropon.previousSibling != element) {
00760         var oldParentNode = element.parentNode;
00761         element.style.visibility = "hidden"; // fix gecko rendering
00762         dropon.parentNode.insertBefore(element, dropon);
00763         if(dropon.parentNode!=oldParentNode) 
00764           Sortable.options(oldParentNode).onChange(element);
00765         Sortable.options(dropon.parentNode).onChange(element);
00766       }
00767     } else {
00768       Sortable.mark(dropon, 'after');
00769       var nextElement = dropon.nextSibling || null;
00770       if(nextElement != element) {
00771         var oldParentNode = element.parentNode;
00772         element.style.visibility = "hidden"; // fix gecko rendering
00773         dropon.parentNode.insertBefore(element, nextElement);
00774         if(dropon.parentNode!=oldParentNode) 
00775           Sortable.options(oldParentNode).onChange(element);
00776         Sortable.options(dropon.parentNode).onChange(element);
00777       }
00778     }
00779   },
00780   
00781   onEmptyHover: function(element, dropon, overlap) {
00782     var oldParentNode = element.parentNode;
00783     var droponOptions = Sortable.options(dropon);
00784         
00785     if(!Element.isParent(dropon, element)) {
00786       var index;
00787       
00788       var children = Sortable.findElements(dropon, {tag: droponOptions.tag, only: droponOptions.only});
00789       var child = null;
00790             
00791       if(children) {
00792         var offset = Element.offsetSize(dropon, droponOptions.overlap) * (1.0 - overlap);
00793         
00794         for (index = 0; index < children.length; index += 1) {
00795           if (offset - Element.offsetSize (children[index], droponOptions.overlap) >= 0) {
00796             offset -= Element.offsetSize (children[index], droponOptions.overlap);
00797           } else if (offset - (Element.offsetSize (children[index], droponOptions.overlap) / 2) >= 0) {
00798             child = index + 1 < children.length ? children[index + 1] : null;
00799             break;
00800           } else {
00801             child = children[index];
00802             break;
00803           }
00804         }
00805       }
00806       
00807       dropon.insertBefore(element, child);
00808       
00809       Sortable.options(oldParentNode).onChange(element);
00810       droponOptions.onChange(element);
00811     }
00812   },
00813 
00814   unmark: function() {
00815     if(Sortable._marker) Sortable._marker.hide();
00816   },
00817 
00818   mark: function(dropon, position) {
00819     // mark on ghosting only
00820     var sortable = Sortable.options(dropon.parentNode);
00821     if(sortable && !sortable.ghosting) return; 
00822 
00823     if(!Sortable._marker) {
00824       Sortable._marker = 
00825         ($('dropmarker') || Element.extend(document.createElement('DIV'))).
00826           hide().addClassName('dropmarker').setStyle({position:'absolute'});
00827       document.getElementsByTagName("body").item(0).appendChild(Sortable._marker);
00828     }    
00829     var offsets = Position.cumulativeOffset(dropon);
00830     Sortable._marker.setStyle({left: offsets[0]+'px', top: offsets[1] + 'px'});
00831     
00832     if(position=='after')
00833       if(sortable.overlap == 'horizontal') 
00834         Sortable._marker.setStyle({left: (offsets[0]+dropon.clientWidth) + 'px'});
00835       else
00836         Sortable._marker.setStyle({top: (offsets[1]+dropon.clientHeight) + 'px'});
00837     
00838     Sortable._marker.show();
00839   },
00840   
00841   _tree: function(element, options, parent) {
00842     var children = Sortable.findElements(element, options) || [];
00843   
00844     for (var i = 0; i < children.length; ++i) {
00845       var match = children[i].id.match(options.format);
00846 
00847       if (!match) continue;
00848       
00849       var child = {
00850         id: encodeURIComponent(match ? match[1] : null),
00851         element: element,
00852         parent: parent,
00853         children: [],
00854         position: parent.children.length,
00855         container: $(children[i]).down(options.treeTag)
00856       }
00857       
00858       /* Get the element containing the children and recurse over it */
00859       if (child.container)
00860         this._tree(child.container, options, child)
00861       
00862       parent.children.push (child);
00863     }
00864 
00865     return parent; 
00866   },
00867 
00868   tree: function(element) {
00869     element = $(element);
00870     var sortableOptions = this.options(element);
00871     var options = Object.extend({
00872       tag: sortableOptions.tag,
00873       treeTag: sortableOptions.treeTag,
00874       only: sortableOptions.only,
00875       name: element.id,
00876       format: sortableOptions.format
00877     }, arguments[1] || { });
00878     
00879     var root = {
00880       id: null,
00881       parent: null,
00882       children: [],
00883       container: element,
00884       position: 0
00885     }
00886     
00887     return Sortable._tree(element, options, root);
00888   },
00889 
00890   /* Construct a [i] index for a particular node */
00891   _constructIndex: function(node) {
00892     var index = '';
00893     do {
00894       if (node.id) index = '[' + node.position + ']' + index;
00895     } while ((node = node.parent) != null);
00896     return index;
00897   },
00898 
00899   sequence: function(element) {
00900     element = $(element);
00901     var options = Object.extend(this.options(element), arguments[1] || { });
00902     
00903     return $(this.findElements(element, options) || []).map( function(item) {
00904       return item.id.match(options.format) ? item.id.match(options.format)[1] : '';
00905     });
00906   },
00907 
00908   setSequence: function(element, new_sequence) {
00909     element = $(element);
00910     var options = Object.extend(this.options(element), arguments[2] || { });
00911     
00912     var nodeMap = { };
00913     this.findElements(element, options).each( function(n) {
00914         if (n.id.match(options.format))
00915             nodeMap[n.id.match(options.format)[1]] = [n, n.parentNode];
00916         n.parentNode.removeChild(n);
00917     });
00918    
00919     new_sequence.each(function(ident) {
00920       var n = nodeMap[ident];
00921       if (n) {
00922         n[1].appendChild(n[0]);
00923         delete nodeMap[ident];
00924       }
00925     });
00926   },
00927   
00928   serialize: function(element) {
00929     element = $(element);
00930     var options = Object.extend(Sortable.options(element), arguments[1] || { });
00931     var name = encodeURIComponent(
00932       (arguments[1] && arguments[1].name) ? arguments[1].name : element.id);
00933     
00934     if (options.tree) {
00935       return Sortable.tree(element, arguments[1]).children.map( function (item) {
00936         return [name + Sortable._constructIndex(item) + "[id]=" + 
00937                 encodeURIComponent(item.id)].concat(item.children.map(arguments.callee));
00938       }).flatten().join('&');
00939     } else {
00940       return Sortable.sequence(element, arguments[1]).map( function(item) {
00941         return name + "[]=" + encodeURIComponent(item);
00942       }).join('&');
00943     }
00944   }
00945 }
00946 
00947 // Returns true if child is contained within element
00948 Element.isParent = function(child, element) {
00949   if (!child.parentNode || child == element) return false;
00950   if (child.parentNode == element) return true;
00951   return Element.isParent(child.parentNode, element);
00952 }
00953 
00954 Element.findChildren = function(element, only, recursive, tagName) {   
00955   if(!element.hasChildNodes()) return null;
00956   tagName = tagName.toUpperCase();
00957   if(only) only = [only].flatten();
00958   var elements = [];
00959   $A(element.childNodes).each( function(e) {
00960     if(e.tagName && e.tagName.toUpperCase()==tagName &&
00961       (!only || (Element.classNames(e).detect(function(v) { return only.include(v) }))))
00962         elements.push(e);
00963     if(recursive) {
00964       var grandchildren = Element.findChildren(e, only, recursive, tagName);
00965       if(grandchildren) elements.push(grandchildren);
00966     }
00967   });
00968 
00969   return (elements.length>0 ? elements.flatten() : []);
00970 }
00971 
00972 Element.offsetSize = function (element, type) {
00973   return element['offset' + ((type=='vertical' || type=='height') ? 'Height' : 'Width')];
00974 }
